short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Giving Liam Fox his true title

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disgraced Former Defence Secretary Liam Fox is a Conservative MP who was forced to resign from the front benches in 2011 after he was caught allowing his friend Adam Werritty to take on an unofficial and undeclared role as his adviser. 

Frequently, Disgraced Former Defence Secretary Liam Fox's name appears without his full title, 'Disgraced Former Defence Secretary', and this app will correct that in news articles, Reddit posts, Google results etc.
